name: H.O.M.E: Hyper Omni Multi Entertainment
description:
An "exquisite corpse" attempt to answer to the theme by a team without artists. Chill at home either by shooting at incoming pedestrians, feeding your fishes, playing video games or calling various shops to buy new guns, games or food for your fish. Oh, and you're a streamer, so everything you do is watched and commented by internet random people.

  • 3 guns to unlock
  • 4 HyperVision games to unlock
  • 3 different phone dialogue trees
  • No art direction

TEAM TREBUCHET TREBUCHERONS

Vincent Brunet-Dupont

Martin Lavoie

Francis De Rico

Guillaume Duquesne

Alexandre Pernot Lopes
